name: invite
description: Get a link for inviting the bot.

name: name
description: Set or remove the nickname of Yoki in this server.

name: ping
description: Check Yoki's latency.

name: prefix
description: Set or view the prefix of this server.

name: privacy
description: Gives the information in a private message about server's privacy on your content.

name: settings
description: View the settings of this server

name: support
description: Get a link for our support server.

name: timezone
description: Set or view the timezone of this server.

name: antiraid
description: Configure the anti-raid module for this server.

subCommands.name: antiraid-challenge
subCommands.description: Set or view the response the bot takes when a user fails the age filter.

subCommands.name: antiraid-age
subCommands.description: Set or view the minimum account age requirement for users to be exempt from the antiraid.

subCommands.name: antiraid-channel
subCommands.description: Set or view the channel where users are presented with challenges if they fail the age filter.

name: appeal
description: Manage server ban appeals.

subCommands.name: appeal-list
subCommands.description: View the list of all ban appeals in this server.

subCommands.name: appeal-view
subCommands.description: View information about the specified appeal.

subCommands.name: appeal-accept
subCommands.description: Accept the specified ban appeal and unban the user who applied.

subCommands.name: appeal-decline
subCommands.description: Reject the specified ban appeal.

subCommands.name: appeal-delete
subCommands.description: Delete the specified appeal.

subCommands.name: appeal-channel
subCommands.description: Set or view the channel where appeals are sent.

name: filter
description: Manage content filtering.

subCommands.name: filter-add
subCommands.description: Add a word or phrase to the automod filter.

subCommands.name: filter-list
subCommands.description: View the list of every word or phrase that will be filtered by automod.

subCommands.name: filter-remove
subCommands.description: Remove a word or phrase from the automod filter.

subCommands.name: filter-onmods
subCommands.description: Set or view whether content created by the moderators are filtered on this server.

subCommands.name: filter-spamfrequency
subCommands.description: Set the required count of messages to be filtered as spam.

subCommands.name: filter-mentionfrequency
subCommands.description: Set the required count of mentions per 5 seconds to filter.

subCommands.name: filter-spaminfractions
subCommands.description: Set how many infraction points users will get if they spam.

name: case
description: View info about the specified case.

name: history
description: Manage and view cases in this server.

subCommands.name: history-view
subCommands.description: Get the list of moderation cases of the specified user.

subCommands.name: history-clear
subCommands.description: Clear the history of the specified user.

subCommands.name: history-all
subCommands.description: Gets the list of all moderation cases in this server.

name: ignore
description: Manage content filtering and auto-mod exceptions.

subCommands.name: ignore-channel
subCommands.description: Set channels ignored by the automod filter.

subCommands.name: ignore-content
subCommands.description: Set channel content ignored by the automod filter.

name: nsfw
description: Set how much confidence NSFW detection should have when filtering images.

name: channelinfo
description: View information about the specified or current channel.

name: dashboard
description: Get a link to the dashboard of the server.

name: roleinfo
description: View information about the specified role.

name: serverinfo
description: View information about this server.

name: userinfo
description: View information about the specified user or yourself.

name: logs
description: Manage how logs are posted.

subCommands.name: logs-types
subCommands.description: List all possible log types.

subCommands.name: logs-list
subCommands.description: See all the enabled log channels in this server.

subCommands.name: logs-set
subCommands.description: Subscribe the specified channel to the specified log type.

subCommands.name: logs-remove
subCommands.description: Unsubscribe the specified channel from the specified log type.

name: ban
description: Ban the specified user from the server.
examples: <@R40Mp0Wd> Talking too much about Town of Salem

name: kick
description: Kick the specified user out of the server.
examples: <@R40Mp0Wd> Talking too much about Town of Salem

name: mute
description: Mute the specified user for the specified amount of time (ex. 3h, 30m, 5d).
examples: <@R40Mp0Wd> 1h Talking too much about Town of Salem

name: note
description: Add an entry to someone's offence history without notifying them.
examples: R40Mp0Wd Talked about Town of Salem. Warned them in DMs.
<@R40Mp0Wd> Can't stop talking about Town of Salem. Warned them publicly in chat.

name: softban
description: Kick out the specified member and clear their messages.
examples: <@R40Mp0Wd> Talking too much about Town of Salem

name: unban
description: Remove a ban from the server for the specified user.

name: unmute
description: Remove a mute for the specified user.

name: warn
description: Add an entry to someone's offence history and notify them.
examples: <@R40Mp0Wd> 20 After what you did, you definitely need +20 infractions.

name: close
description: Close the current or specified user's modmail ticket.

name: modmail
description: Manage modmail/ticket system.
examples: reply Hi, what can I help you with?

subCommands.name: close
subCommands.description: Close the current or specified user's modmail ticket.

subCommands.name: modmail-history
subCommands.description: View user's created modmail tickets.

subCommands.name: modmail-settrigger
subCommands.description: Select a message that can be used to create modmail tickets.

subCommands.name: modmail-sendtrigger
subCommands.description: Send a message that can be used to create modmail tickets.

name: module
description: Manage modules/available features for this server.

subCommands.name: module-enable
subCommands.description: Enable a Yoki module for this server.

subCommands.name: module-disable
subCommands.description: Disable a Yoki module for this server.

subCommands.name: module-list
subCommands.description: View the enabled and disabled modules for this server.

name: preset
description: Manage filter presets.

subCommands.name: preset-enable
subCommands.description: Enable a filter preset.

subCommands.name: preset-disable
subCommands.description: Disable a filter preset.

subCommands.name: preset-list
subCommands.description: View the enabled and disabled presets in this server.

name: role
description: Manage Yoki's roles.

subCommands.name: role-staff
subCommands.description: Set moderator/staff roles for using moderation commands.

subCommands.name: role-mute
subCommands.description: Set the role given when user is muted.

subCommands.name: role-member
subCommands.description: Set the role for people who get verified by Yoki.

subCommands.name: role-modmail
subCommands.description: Set the role that gets pinged when new modmail threads are created.

name: severity
description: Manage auto-mod action results.

subCommands.name: severity-threshold
subCommands.description: Set how many infraction points are required for each level of moderation severity.

name: link
description: Manage domain and invite filter lists.

subCommands.name: link-url
subCommands.description: Manage domain blacklists and whitelists.

subCommands.name: link-url-add
subCommands.description: Add a domain to the blacklist or whitelist.

subCommands.name: link-url-remove
subCommands.description: Remove a domain from the blacklist or whitelist.

subCommands.name: link-url-whitelist
subCommands.description: Set whether the URL filter is whitelisted or blacklisted.

subCommands.name: link-invite
subCommands.description: Manage invite whitelist.

subCommands.name: link-invite-add
subCommands.description: Add a vanity url to the invite __whitelist__.

subCommands.name: link-invite-remove
subCommands.description: Remove a server from the __whitelist__.

subCommands.name: link-list
subCommands.description: View the list of every link domain that is blacklisted.

subCommands.name: link-severity
subCommands.description: Set the severity and the infraction points of non-whitelisted links.
